trait.name: Chlorophyll
entries: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during strong sunlight.

trait.name: Evolution
entries: Bulbasaur can evolve into Ivysaur at level 8 and above.

action.name: Tackle (1 action)
entries: Make a melee attack roll against a Pokémon, doing {@dice 1d6} + Strength on a hit.
Higher Levels: The base damage increases to {@dice 1d8} at level 5, {@dice 1d10} at level 10, and {@dice 1d12} at level 17.

action.name: Growl (1 action)
entries: You target a Pokémon within 100 feet with an intimidating growl. The Pokémon must make a Wisdom save against your Strength or Charisma Move DC (your choice). On a failure, it adds -1 to any damage roll it makes for 1 minute. This modifier can be stacked if it fails multiple Growl saves, up to a maximum of -5.
